description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nDefy the Gods:
After this creature {ACTION_attacks} an ally with less than 50% {STAT_health}, it is killed, then this creature resurrects it with 100% {STAT_health} and 50% more {STAT_attack}, {STAT_intelligence}, and {STAT_speed}.
name: Incursion Scythe
